info.name: Task Manager
info.description: A RESTful API application that allows users to manage their tasks efficiently. Tasks can be organized into categories, and users can differentiate tasks based on their types (Text or List). The API supports user authentication via basic HTTP authentication and includes features for creating, reading, updating, and deleting categories and tasks. Additionally, tasks can be shared with all users or kept private. The application also provides functionality for pagination, filtering, and sorting tasks to enhance task management and accessibility.
